casebody.data:
No. 513,

Misc.

Crawford v. Bannan, Warden. Petitioner pro se. Frank J. Kelley, Attorney General of Michigan, Robert A. Derengoski, Solicitor General, and James R. Ramsey, Assistant Attorney General, for respondent. Erwin Ellmann for the American Civil Liberties Union of Michigan, as amicus curiae, in support of the petition.

C. A. 6th Cir. Certiorari and other relief denied.

Mr. Justice Black and Mr. Justice Douglas are of the opinion that certiorari should be granted and the judgment reversed for the reasons stated in their dissenting opinion in Link-letter v. Walker, ante, p. 640.
